answerText: Faraday effect[10] This constant relates the magnetic flux and the change in polarization angle in the Faraday effect.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Maryland B and Michigan A | 5 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This effect occurs when a magnetic field changes the polarization of light that passes through a dielectric. For 10 points each: [10] Name this linear effect discovered by a British scientist who also names a Maxwell equation relating the voltage to the time change in magnetic flux.
